name: idb-key-to-string
description: A simple string serialization for IndexedDB-like keys

scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:mjs & npm run build:cjs & wait
scripts.build:cjs: tsc -d -p tsconfig.cjs.json && npm run sed && npm run mv
scripts.mv: for f in cjs/*.js; do shx mv "$f" "${f%.js}.cjs"; done
